And <WG2532> he gave <WG1325> him <WG846> none <WG3756> inheritance <WG2817> in <WG1722> it, no, <WG846> not <WG3761> so much as to set his foot on: <WG968> <WG4228> yet <WG2532> he promised <WG1861> that he would give <WG1325> it <WG846> to him <WG846> for <WG1519> a possession, <WG2697> and <WG2532> to his <WG846> seed <WG4690> after <WG3326> him, <WG846> when as yet he <WG846> had <WG5607> no <WG3756> child. <WG5043>

Till <WG891> <WG3757> another <WG2087> king <WG935> arose, <WG450> which <WG3739> knew <WG1492> not <WG3756> Joseph. <WG2501>
